Title: FlowPad
Description: Flowpad is a light, fast and easy to use flow diagram editor. It helps you quickly pour your algorithms from your mind to 'paper'. It is written using WPF/C# 3.5.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Flowpad is a light, fast and easy to use flow diagram editor. It helps you quickly pour your algorithms from your mind to 'paper'. It is written using WPF/C# 3.5.

Below is simple diagram created in flowpad. Go to Downloads tab and get the alpha release.
If you feel familiar with such a way of creating diagrams and you are a developer - please download the souce code and consider making a contribution to this project
